title: create_new_order_api
description: Test the /api/orders POST endpoint to verify that a new order can be created successfully with valid items and total amount, and that the server handles errors properly.

title: get_order_by_id_api
description: Test the /api/orders/{id} GET endpoint to ensure it retrieves the correct order by ID, returns 404 for non-existent orders, and handles server errors.

title: get_user_orders_api
description: Test the /api/user/orders GET endpoint to verify that it returns the list of orders for the authenticated user and handles server errors.

title: get_all_users_admin_api
description: Test the /api/admin/users GET endpoint to confirm that only admin users can retrieve the list of all users, with proper handling of unauthorized access and server errors.

title: get_user_permissions_api
description: Test the /api/user/permissions GET endpoint to verify that it returns the permissions of the authenticated user and handles server errors.

title: check_specific_permission_api
description: Test the /api/user/permissions/{permission} GET endpoint to check if a specific permission is correctly identified for the user and that server errors are handled.

title: get_job_listings_api
description: Test the /api/jobs GET endpoint to ensure it returns the list of job listings successfully and handles server errors.

title: create_new_job_api
description: Test the /api/jobs POST endpoint to verify that a new job can be created with valid title, company, and description, and that server errors are handled.

title: get_skills_list_api
description: Test the /api/skills GET endpoint to confirm it returns the list of skills successfully and handles server errors.

title: add_new_skill_api
description: Test the /api/skills POST endpoint to verify that a new skill can be added with valid name and category, and that server errors are handled.
